doc:
Angelique Rockas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Angelique_Rockas 0 Angelique Rockas (born in Boksburg, South Africa) is an actress, producer and activist, most notable for introducing London to its first multi-racial and multi-national theatre productions in the 1980s. Rockas founded Internationalist Theatre in the UK with patron Athol Fugard. The theater featured multi-racial casts in classical plays, breaking racial barriers that were once accepted norms for theatrical performances. Angelique_Rockas ( born in Boksburg , South_Africa ) is an_actress_,_producer_and_activist , most_notable for introducing London to its_first_multi-racial_and_multi-national_theatre_productions in the_1980s . Rockas founded Internationalist_Theatre in the_UK with patron_Athol_Fugard . The_theater featured multi-racial casts in classical_plays , breaking racial_barriers that were_once_accepted norms for theatrical_performances .
